Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Aphid BCR5 (bacteriocyte-specific cyeteine-rich peptide 5; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals; 3S=S, UCSS1a)

Literature.Author: Uchi N, Fukudome M, Nozaki N, Suzuki M, Osuki KI, Shigenobu S, Uchiumi T.2019
Literature.Title: Antimicrobial Activities of Cysteine-rich Peptides Specific to Bacteriocytes of the Pea Aphid Acyrthosiphon pisum.

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (50%) toAphid BCR4GRAVY: -0.17; mol wt: 6534.557; Mol formula: C283H432N71O87S9; Mol ex Coeff: 11947.5 (Cys paired).Activity: Active against E. coli MG1655 (MIC 5 uM). DNA sequence provided by Toshiki UCHIUMI.
